title: Bug: No Scoped Type Hierarchy on Binary Projects
description: When I hit F4 on a binary project selection (e.g. org.apache.ant), I get the following error message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'. I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. By the way, could you please explain what does the error message mean?
OB: When hitting F4 on a binary project selection, an error message is displayed.
EB: I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars instead of the error message.
SR: To reproduce the issue, open a binary project and hit F4 on a project selection.
